definition: (of fabrics) having soft nap produced by brushing
details:
adjective
- (of fabrics) having soft nap produced by brushing
= example: (of fabrics) having soft nap produced by brushing
= synonyms: fleecy, napped
- (of hair or clothing) groomed with a brush
= example: (of hair or clothing) groomed with a brush
- touched lightly in passing
